bb19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f111bad25839.title: ZiS-5 Breech
bb19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f111bad25839.description:
The breech of the Soviet KV-1 cannon from World War II

Uses regular shells
Unitary loading

bb19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f111bad25842.title: F-34 Breech
bb19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f111bad25842.description:
The breech of the Soviet T-34 cannon from World War II

Uses regular shells
Unitary loading

bb19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f111bad25840.title: KwK 37 Breech
bb19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f111bad25840.description:
The breech of the German cannon from World War II

Uses regular shells
Unitary loading

bb19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f111bad25843.title: 8,8cm KwK 36 Breech
bb19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f111bad25843.description:
The breech of the German Tiger I cannon from World War II

Uses big shells
Unitary loading

bb19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f111bad25844.title: KwK 42 Breech
bb19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f111bad25844.description:
The breech of the German Panther cannon from World War II

Uses big shells
Unitary loading

bb19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f111bad25841.title: M-10T Breech
bb19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f111bad25841.description:
The breech of a Soviet howitzer from World War II

Uses howitzer shells
Separated loading

ec19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f111bad25840.title: AP Shell
ec19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f111bad25840.description:
Regular Armor-Piercing shell
Effective against armored targets.

Explodes behind the armor.

Initial speed: 550 m/s
Penetration capacity: 20
Max durability: 7.6
Fuse sensitivity: 5

ec19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f111bad25841.title: HE Shell
ec19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f111bad25841.description:
Regular High-Explosive shell
Effective against manpower and lightly armored targets.

Explodes with a lot of shrapnel at any hit.

Initial speed: 460 m/s

ec18cdbf-865e-122c-9c5e-f111bad25840.title: AP Shell
ec18cdbf-865e-122c-9c5e-f111bad25840.description:
Big Armor-Piercing shell
Effective against armored targets.

Explodes behind the armor.

Initial speed: 620 m/s
Penetration capacity: 35
Max durability: 8.5
Fuse sensitivity: 5

ec18cdbf-865e-122c-9c5e-f111bad25841.title: HE Shell
ec18cdbf-865e-122c-9c5e-f111bad25841.description:
Big High-Explosive shell
Effective against manpower and lightly armored targets.

Explodes with a lot of shrapnel at any hit.

Initial speed: 500 m/s

ec19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f122bed25802.title: Howitzer HE Bullet
ec19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f122bed25802.description:
High-Explosive bullet
Effective.

Explodes with a lot of shrapnel at any hit.

cc19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f111ccc25801.title: 152mm Sleeve
cc19cdbf-865e-401c-9c5e-f111ccc25801.description: Case for howitzer 152mm bullets. Gives the projectile an initial speed of 250 m/s

55a069ad-4512-421d-b46b-7d14fb7f3b53.title: Player Fixer
55a069ad-4512-421d-b46b-7d14fb7f3b53.description: Use it to mount your character

66a069ab-4512-421d-b46b-7d14fb7f3b55.title: Turret Steer
66a069ab-4512-421d-b46b-7d14fb7f3b55.description:
Press A or D to rotate your turret instead of using buttons or controllers

Press 1 to slow down and 2 to speed up the rotation speed

66a069ab-4512-421d-b46b-7d14fb7f3b22.title: Periscope
66a069ab-4512-421d-b46b-7d14fb7f3b22.description:
Connect it to a viewport to see behind walls
You can connect bearings to it and press WASD to turn the viewport

66a069ab-4512-421d-b46b-7d14fb7f3d07.title: Machine Gun Handle
66a069ab-4512-421d-b46b-7d14fb7f3d07.description: Connect it to bearings to control them with WASD
